title: EP - 84 - TEDDI MELLENCAMP - REAL HOUSEWIVES OF BEVERLY HILLS
description:
Teddi Mellencamp explains how she was cast for Real Housewives of Beverly Hills, which cast members she bonded with, and if she has any regrets after the season. 


Dr. Jerry Weichman, licensed psychologist and adolescent specialist, reviews the new show Undercover High on A&E and discusses what issues are most of concern to students and parents in American high schools today. 


Steve Stauff reviews the season premiere of Sister Wives on TLC.
